name: Thunderbolt X200
description: A high-performance motorcycle with a powerful 200cc engine, perfect for city rides and long-distance travel.

name: StormRider 500
description: The StormRider 500 combines speed and agility, featuring a 500cc engine and advanced suspension for smooth rides on any terrain.

name: Falcon RS 350
description: A sleek and stylish 350cc motorcycle designed for both performance and comfort, equipped with modern safety features.

name: Viper GTS 750
description: Experience the thrill of the open road with the Viper GTS 750, featuring a 750cc engine and cutting-edge technology.

name: Jaguar XR 1000
description: The Jaguar XR 1000 is a beast on two wheels, with a 1000cc engine and advanced aerodynamics for unmatched performance.

name: Phoenix S200
description: The Phoenix S200 is a versatile motorcycle with a 200cc engine, designed for both city commuting and weekend adventures.

name: ShadowHawk 450
description: ShadowHawk 450 is known for its durability and power, with a 450cc engine that ensures a smooth and powerful ride.

name: Raptor Z800
description: The Raptor Z800 is the ultimate high-performance motorcycle, featuring an 800cc engine and state-of-the-art features for professional riders.
